attributes.action: Introduce legislation allowing investigators to still question police officers who resign when under investigation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have we heard that a police officer cannot be questioned, when he/she is under investigation, because they have resigned. A Regulation 9 Notice should still be served on police officers even if they resign. This would allow a full and transparent investigation to be completed.
